dict.string: We need access to your camera to take photos and videos for sharing with your contacts, video calls, and live streaming features.
We need access to your microphone for voice messages, voice calls, video calls, and live streaming features.
We need access to your photo library to select and share photos and videos with your contacts.
We need permission to save photos and videos to your photo library.
We need your location to share your current location with contacts and discover nearby users.
We need access to your contacts to help you find friends who are already using the app.
We use Face ID to securely authenticate and protect your account.
We need access to speech recognition for voice-to-text features in messages.
We need access to your calendar to help you schedule events and meetings.
We need access to your reminders to set notifications for important events.
